Text:
One afternoon, Alpha stands alone in the middle of
town...

Hey there, little lady! Are you free? You're free,
aren't you? How about a cup of tea at that fancy
cafe there?
No, thank you.

Well then, how about the two of us take a tour around
town? I'll escort you in the finest carriage.
I'm good.

How about seeing a play if you're not interested in
food or carriages? There's one that's all the rage
right now.
Not interested.

(...This guy is being a real pain. Having an
appearance that draws attention is a double-
edged sword.)

(Although thanks to my appearance, I can get the
enemy to sometimes lower their guard.)

(That said...Cid can blend in without a trace, no
matter his appearance. If I'm blaming my looks,
I still have a long way to go.)

Hey hey! Pretty lady! Waiting for someone? How about
a rendevous with me—
*sigh* Pathetic.
Gah...! That blow came outta nowhere...!

The sharpness of that slash was truly first-rate.
Heheh. You're the very embodiment of my ideal
woman.

(No matter how beautiful I look, I should be able to
blend into the crowd, especially as the first member
of the Seven Shadows...)

I-I'm Po, th-th-third son of the Tato family...
No, I'm just a boy standing in front of a girl,
asking her to date him on the premise of
marriage—
Try again, little boy.
Agh! My manhood...!
(Seriously... Today's a complete failure.)

(The informant from the Cult insisted on meeting in
a public place, so I reluctantly agreed, but...)

(He must've been spooked that he'd be immediately
eliminated once our conversation ended.)

(But this is all so pointless. Even if I kept to his
conditions for giving intel, I could still just kill
him afterward and achieve the same result.)

(The negotiator mentioned that the informant
refused to be persuaded no matter what, which
makes me think he might be driven by some kind
of obsessive compulsion.)

(Or he might be up to something... That's why I came
early to sweep the vicinity as a precautionary
measure, but it completely backfired.)
(...Oh, not again. I can sense someone approaching.)

Lost in thought? If you have any worries, I'd be
happy to listen.
C-Cid...! What are you doing here...?

I was walking around and saw you get approached by
two guys. They're actually friends of mine, you know?

So, I asked what they were up to, and they said,
"That beautiful girl rejected us!" Then they egged me
on by saying, "You go get your pride crushed too!"
...Hehe. You're so full of it, Cid.
No, really. I'm serious.

(He likely couldn't stand seeing me draw unnecessary
attention to myself and decided to intervene.)

(Maybe it's also his way of warning me to pull myself
together...)
Thank you.
Huh? For what?

Hehe... You really haven't changed in that regard,
have you?

Hey, since you're here, how about we go some place
else?
Sure. Let's go somewhere that fits the mood.
(...Leave it to Cid to know about such a lovely café.)

Your local intel-gathering is as impeccable as ever.
Or...is there some clue in this cafe related to the
Cult?

Nope. It's just super popular right now, so I thought
I'd come by and see what all the fuss is about.

(After all, side characters always line up for popular
venues.)
R-Really...?

Alright, I understand. Let's enjoy this time together
to the fullest. I won't let your thoughtfulness go to
waste...okay?
Huh? Uh, sure...

Let's order something to drink first. As for the
pancakes, which do you think is good? Let's
take a look at the menu together, Cid.

(She seems almost giddy. Does she really like
pancakes that much?)

(If this is what Cid wants, then for now, I'll just
be...a regular girl.)
And so, Alpha enjoys a rare moment alone with Cid...
Time passes in the blink of an eye...
(It's almost time for the meeting...)
Something wrong?

(If I'm being honest, part of me wishes I could stay
and enjoy my time with Cid, but...)
Alpha?

I'm sorry, Cid. There's something I have to attend
to. I must go now...
Really?
Yes. This is where we part ways. Goodbye...

(My time being a regular girl is over. Now I go back
to being Alpha, the first member of the Shadow
Garden.)
And she's gone...

(Maybe she's doing something with the Seven Shadows
again... Once more, I'm left out of the group. Yup,
it's lonely being me...)

Oblivious to Cid's feelings, Alpha continues to go
about her work as the first member of the Seven
Shadows...
